1.content: Add file upload and processing capabilities to the platform
1.details: 1. Implement drag-and-drop file upload interface. 2. Add support for CSV, PDF, TXT, JSON files. 3. Create file storage using Supabase Storage. 4. Implement real-time file processing workflows.

2.content: Implement real AI-powered data analysis using free APIs
2.details: 1. Connect Hugging Face API for text analysis (sentiment, classification, summarization). 2. Add document processing with Azure Computer Vision. 3. Create automated data insights generation. 4. Add real-time processing status updates.

3.content: Build data visualization and export features
3.details: 1. Create dynamic charts and graphs from uploaded data. 2. Add data filtering and search capabilities. 3. Implement export functionality (PDF reports, CSV, JSON). 4. Add data comparison and trend analysis.

4.content: Add automation workflows for data processing
4.details: 1. Create automated data cleaning workflows. 2. Add scheduled data processing jobs. 3. Implement data validation and error handling. 4. Add notification system for workflow completion.

5.content: Deploy and test the fully functional platform
5.details: 1. Test file upload with real data samples. 2. Verify all AI processing workflows. 3. Test data visualization and export. 4. Validate automation workflows. 5. Ensure zero-cost operation using free APIs.
